org.esupportail.commons.services.smtp
Class AbstractSmtpService

java.lang.Object
  org.esupportail.commons.services.smtp.AbstractSmtpService
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, SmtpService
Direct Known Subclasses:
SimpleSmtpServiceImpl, VoidSmtpServiceImpl
public abstract class AbstractSmtpService
extends java.lang.Object
implements SmtpService

An abstract implementation of SmtpService that does not support tests.

See Also:
